# Ginza Empire

> Sydney's premier licensed Asian brothel located at 310 Cleveland St, Surry Hills NSW 2010.
> Open daily 10:30am – 1:00am (Monday to Sunday).
> Phone: (02) 8283 2130 | 0416 020 278

Ginza Empire is a fully licensed Sydney brothel, recently renovated with luxuriously appointed
themed private rooms — each with its own en-suite shower, climate control, and AV system.

Safe sex practices are mandatory. The venue operates under NSW health and licensing regulations.

## Pages

- [Home](https://sydneyginza.github.io/): Welcome, announcements, new arrivals, location and hours.
- [Roster](https://sydneyginza.github.io/roster): Photo gallery of currently available ladies.
- [Girls](https://sydneyginza.github.io/girls): Full list of all ladies with filtering by availability, nationality, and more.
- [Rates](https://sydneyginza.github.io/rates): Indicative service rates and room hire pricing.
- [Employment](https://sydneyginza.github.io/employment): Work opportunities for ladies — flexible hours, high earnings, safe environment.

## Location

310 Cleveland St, Surry Hills NSW 2010 (back entrance via Goodlet Lane).

## Hours

Monday to Sunday: 10:30am – 1:00am
